dataset.description: The qualified name of the dataset, which is the combination dataset name, datasource name and database information. Format is [datasource]/[dataset_prefix_1]/.../[dataset_prefix_N]/[dataset]

filter.description: The filter where clause to be applied to the dataset

variables.description: The variables to be used within the contract file

soda_agent.description: The agent configuration to be used within the contract file

cron.description: Cron expression in the format '* * * * *' (minute hour day month weekday). Requires string in quotes.

timezone.description: The timezone to be used within the contract file

variables.description: The variables to be used within the contract file

columns.description: The list of columns, also known as 'the schema' of the dataset.

name.description: The name of the column as in the SQL data_source

description.description: The description to be used anywhere this column is shown to users

data_type.description: The SQL data type as in the data_source

character_maximum_length.description: Length is only checked by the schema check if character_maximum_length is specified in the column and supported by the data source.

optional.description: When set to true, the schema check will not fail if the column is not present. Default is required.

name.description: The display name for the check used in Soda Cloud

qualifier.description: The qualifier for the check used in Soda Cloud

filter.description: Specifies a sql expression filter that should be applied on the metric

missing_values.description: Customized list of missing values. NULL is always considered missing so that does not have to be specified. If no customization is needed, consider specifying not_null:true instead.

regex.description: Customized regex to identify missing values. The flavor of regex depends on the SQL engine / data_source. NULL is always considered missing so that does not have to be specified.

name.description: Name that describes the regex pattern.
The display name for the check used in Soda Cloud

qualifier.description: The qualifier for the check used in Soda Cloud

filter.description: Specifies a sql expression filter that should be applied on the metric

valid_values.description: A list of valid values. Only supports all strings or all numbers. Implies an invalid_count check in Soda.

regex.description: Customized regex to identify valid values. The flavor of regex depends on the SQL engine / data_source. NULL is always considered missing so that does not have to be specified.

name.description: Name that describes the regex pattern.

invalid_values.description: A list of valid values. Only supports all strings or all numbers. Implies an invalid_count check in Soda.

regex.description: Customized regex to identify invalid values. The flavor of regex depends on the SQL engine / data_source. NULL is always considered missing so that does not have to be specified.

name.description: Name that describes the regex pattern.

valid_length.description: The length of the valid values

valid_min_length.description: The minimum length of the valid values

valid_max_length.description: The maximum length of the valid values

valid_min.description: The minimum value of the valid values

valid_max.description: The maximum value of the valid values

valid_reference_data.description: Verify valid values occur in a reference dataset

dataset.description: The dataset to be used for the reference data check. Dataset qualified name is required.

column.description: The column to be used for the reference data check

qualifier.description: The qualifier for the check used in Soda Cloud

filter.description: Specifies a sql expression filter that should be applied on the metric

function.description: The function to be used for the aggregate check

checks.description: A list of checks for this dataset executed by a Soda

qualifier.description: The qualifier for the check used in Soda Cloud

filter.description: Specifies a sql expression filter that should be applied on the metric

oneOf.description: Use a schema check to validate the presence, absence or position of columns in a dataset, or to validate the type of data column contains. See documentation for more details: https://docs.soda.io/soda-cl/schema.html

name.description: The display name for the check used in Soda Cloud

qualifier.description: The qualifier for the check used in Soda Cloud

filter.description: Specifies a sql expression filter that should be applied on the metric

allow_extra_columns.description: Allow columns that are not in the schema

allow_other_column_order.description: Allow columns to be in a different order than the schema

generic_check_properties.description: NOT USED YET, problem with inheritance and additionalProperties

name.description: The display name for the check used in Soda Cloud

qualifier.description: The qualifier for the check used in Soda Cloud

filter.description: Specifies a sql expression filter that should be applied on the metric

threshold.description: The threshold for the check. See documentation for more details: https://docs.soda.io/#thresholds

metric.description: The type of the metric value to check

must_be.description: YY The value the check metric (as specified in the type) must have for the check to pass; The check passes if the metric has the specified value, and fails otherwise; https://docs.soda.io/#thresholds

must_not_be.description: The value that the check metric (as specified in the type) may not have. The check passes if the metric doesn't have this value and fails otherwise.

must_be_greater_than.description: Specifies the threshold for the check. The check fails if the metric value is greater than the specified threshold value.

must_be_greater_than_or_equal.description: Specifies the threshold for the check. The check fails if the metric value is greater than or equal to the specified threshold value.

must_be_less_than.description: Specifies the threshold for the check. The check fails if the metric value is less than the specified threshold value.

must_be_less_than_or_equal.description: Specifies the threshold for the check. The check fails if the metric value is less than or equal to the specified threshold value.

must_be_between.description: Specifies the threshold for the check. The check fails if the metric value is not between the specified threshold values.

must_be_not_between.description: Specifies the threshold for the check. The check fails if the metric value is between the specified threshold values.

thresholdFreshness.description: The threshold for the check. See documentation for more details: https://docs.soda.io/#thresholds

unit.description: The type of the metric value to check

must_be.description: YY The value the check metric (as specified in the type) must have for the check to pass; The check passes if the metric has the specified value, and fails otherwise; https://docs.soda.io/#thresholds

must_not_be.description: The value that the check metric (as specified in the type) may not have. The check passes if the metric doesn't have this value and fails otherwise.

must_be_greater_than.description: Specifies the threshold for the check. The check fails if the metric value is greater than the specified threshold value.

must_be_greater_than_or_equal.description: Specifies the threshold for the check. The check fails if the metric value is greater than or equal to the specified threshold value.

must_be_less_than.description: Specifies the threshold for the check. The check fails if the metric value is less than the specified threshold value.

must_be_less_than_or_equal.description: Specifies the threshold for the check. The check fails if the metric value is less than or equal to the specified threshold value.

must_be_between.description: Specifies the threshold for the check. The check fails if the metric value is not between the specified threshold values.

must_be_not_between.description: Specifies the threshold for the check. The check fails if the metric value is between the specified threshold values.
